conversation.content: Hello, my name is Dr. Adams. I'll be conducting a psychological assessment using the DSM-5 Self-Rated Level 1 Cross-Cutting Symptom Measure—Adult. This questionnaire will help us understand your current mental health symptoms. All your answers will be confidential. I'll ask you 23 questions about your experiences over the last two weeks. Take your time, and feel free to describe your feelings in your own words. Are you ready to begin?
Yeah, I guess. Um... I just hope this helps... sometimes I'm not sure what's real, but I'll try to answer...
Thank you. First question: Little interest or pleasure in doing things?
It's hard to get into things anymore. Like, I used to like reading, but now it feels... pointless. The voices get in the way too.
Feeling down, depressed, or hopeless?
Yeah... I feel heavy a lot. Like there's a weight on my chest. But sometimes I wonder if that's just the meds making me feel that way?
Feeling more irritated, grouchy, or angry than usual?
Hmm... Not really? Wait, maybe? Sometimes I snap at people. The voices get louder when there's noise, so I guess that's part of it...
Sleeping less than usual, but still have a lot of energy?
Oh, I barely sleep. I'll stay up all night sometimes. But I'm not energetic—it's just... can't shut my mind off. The thoughts race, you know?
Starting lots more projects than usual or doing more risky things than usual?
No... I just... I've stopped a lot of things. The voices tell me not to finish stuff sometimes, like it's a trap.
Feeling nervous, anxious, frightened, worried, or on edge?
Anxious? Yeah. Like someone's always watching. I check doors constantly. What if they come in while I'm alone...?
Feeling panic or being frightened?
Panic... happens. Like last week, I thought I saw someone in the mirror that wasn't me. That was scary. But maybe I'm overreacting?
Avoiding situations that make you anxious?
I avoid crowds. The bus makes me too jumpy. I'd rather stay home even if it means... getting more behind? Wait, no, less. I'm confused.
Unexplained aches and pains (e.g., head, back, joints, abdomen, legs)?
My head feels like it's splitting sometimes. Maybe from stress? Or are they poking my brain? I don't know... the doctors can't find anything.
Feeling that your illnesses are not being taken seriously enough?
They just give me pills. Don't they listen when I say the voices are real? I mean, I know I should be grateful, but... does anyone really get it?
Hearing things that others couldn't hear, like voices when no one is around?
(Pauses, then whispers) There's... sometimes. But I shouldn't say that. They're listening. Or maybe I'm imagining it? The voices... they're there. But I don't want to sound crazy again.
Feeling that someone could hear your thoughts, or that you could hear what another person was thinking?
They can hear me, right? Like, I think something and suddenly someone says it. Coincidence? Or are they intercepting my thoughts? I try not to think too much about it...
Problems with sleep that affected your sleep quality overall?
Sleep's a mess. I wake up sweating sometimes. Or I dream about... strange stuff. Not sure if it's dreams or memories.
Problems with memory (e.g., learning new information) or with location (e.g., finding your way home)?
I get lost sometimes. Like, I'll walk to the store and forget why I'm there. My mind just... skips ahead. The meds make it worse, I think.
Unpleasant thoughts, urges, or images that repeatedly enter your mind?
Yeah, but like... not like normal thoughts. They're more like... whispers in my head that tell me to do things. Or pictures of things that aren't there... Wait, is that what you mean?
Feeling driven to perform certain behaviors or mental acts over and over again?
I check the locks. Like, three times. Or maybe five? Sometimes I count steps when I walk. Not sure if that's because of the meds or... whatever's happening.
Feeling detached or distant from yourself, your body, your physical surroundings, or your memories?
Like I'm watching myself from outside. Or... my memories feel fuzzy. Sometimes I think I'm reliving old moments instead of being here now?
Feeling that you don't know who you really are or what you want out of life?
I don't know. Sometimes I think I'm someone else entirely. And... sometimes I think I'm being replaced. Like my thoughts aren't mine anymore.
Feeling that you don't feel close to others or enjoy your relationships?
It's hard to trust people. Maybe I'm being watched. Or maybe I'm just... numb? I used to like hanging out, but now it feels... too much.
